forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city wears a cloak of cloudiness, with a gentle chill whispering through the air. Tonight's temperatures are expected to hover around a mild 57 degrees, tempered by a soft wind from the west-southwest. The clouds above weave a tapestry of anticipation, hinting at the clear skies brewing just beyond the horizon. 

As dawn breaks on Monday, a shift occurs. The sun will peek through, illuminating the city with a warm glow. You can expect a high near 66, though the afternoon may feel a touch cooler as temperatures ease down to 64. It will be a day of fleeting clouds and hints of sunshine, dancing with gentle breezes, making for a pleasant urban experience. Casual layers are recommended—a light jacket or sweater will provide comfort during the cooler moments, while midday offers the opportunity to enjoy outdoor strolls along the waterfront or a quiet afternoon at your favorite café, watching the world maneuver against the backdrop of warming skies.
